General.Name: Chengdu Road & Bridge Engineering Co Ltd
General.Description: Chengdu Road & Bridge Engineering CO.,LTD engages in the engineering and construction business in China and internationally. The company undertakes highway, bridge, tunnel, and municipal construction projects; and provides highway, bridge, tunnel, and mechanical and electrical engineering services. It is also involved in the pavement, and transportation facilities and commercial rafts installation; and offers construction and project construction management services. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.
